headline.main: Parenteau Scores in OT, Leafs Come Back to Beat Bruins 4-3
headline.print_headline: Parenteau Scores in OT, Leafs Come Back to Beat Bruins 4-3

docs.snippet: Pierre-Alexandre Parenteau scored a power-play goal with 1:54 left in overtime and the Toronto Maple Leafs rallied to beat the Boston Bruins 4-3 on Tuesday night and end a four-game skid....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pierre-Alexandre Parenteau scored a power-play goal with 1:54 left in overtime and the Toronto Maple Leafs rallied to beat the Boston Bruins 4-3 on Tuesday night and end a four-game skid.

headline.main: APNewsBreak: Snyder Plans $30M Credit for Flint Customers
headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: Snyder Plans $30M Credit for Flint Customers

docs.snippet: Michigan Gov. Rick Snyder will propose $30 million in state funding to help pay the water bills of Flint residents facing an emergency over the city's lead-contaminated water supply....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michigan Gov. Rick Snyder will propose $30 million in state funding to help pay the water bills of Flint residents facing an emergency over the city's lead-contaminated water supply.

headline.main: Trace Elements of DNA Found From Hawaii Helicopter Crash

docs.snippet: Trace elements of DNA have been found from Marines killed in a helicopter crash off Hawaii last month, the Marine Corps said Tuesday....

headline.main: Evergrande Splash the Cash to Snap Up Martinez
headline.print_headline: Evergrande Splash the Cash to Snap Up Martinez

docs.snippet: Guangzhou Evergrande have signed striker Jackson Martinez from Atletico Madrid for a bumper transfer fee of 42 million euros ($46 million), the south China club confirmed on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Guangzhou Evergrande have signed striker Jackson Martinez from Atletico Madrid for a bumper transfer fee of 42 million euros ($46 million), the south China club confirmed on Wednesday.
